body.name: Sweetcrispy Swivel Rocking Rocker Recliner, Glider Nursery Chair for Living Room with Extra Large Footrest, High Back, Upholstered Deep Seat (Light Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 53 mins
features: 【360°Swivel Recliner Chair】The swivel rocking chair nursery allow you to swivel 360°. The backrest can be tilted from 95 degrees to 160 degrees, Footrest adjustment angle is 0-90°, to meet the needs of different scenes and you can fully relax in this magic nursery glider chair.

【Comfortable Upholstery】The upholstery of the glide rocking chair is a selected linen fabric, which is breathable and skin-friendly.The backrest and seat have better resilience and are not easily deformed after long-term use.

【Strong and Durable Metal Frame】You don't have to worry about nursery glider recliner durability! Our rocking recliner chairs are made of a sturdy metal frame, And the sturdy metal base provides a silky smooth swivel and stability， which can easily hold up to 250 lbs.

【 Wide Use】This swivel rocker recliner chair can be used in the living room, It comes in finishes that will blend seamlessly into your nursery, bedroom, or study. Everyone will be asking for a turn to relax on this recliner sofa of yours. Our recliner chair will accompany you and your family and friends.

【Easy Assembly】OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 29.1’ ’D x 30.3” W x 40.2” H; Ship in a single box, meaning it's easy to carry the shipping box to the assembly area. It is also easy to assemble, you can refer to the assembly instructions to assemble it, it only takes 8-15 minutes. It will be a good choice to accompany you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360 Degree Swivel & Rocking Design - Provides You With More Convenience Rocking and swiveling two-in-one functional design allows you to have multi-functional furniture in your limited space! The 360-degree metal swivel base is designed to last years of enjoyment and use.
The sturdy wooden frame and high-quality metal base make the rocking chair nursery more stable and durable.

A pocket on the side of the armrest provides easy access to items. The simple and stylish look makes this chair perfect for relaxing or a baby nursery. Experience soothing gliding motion & and easy 360° swivel with our Nursery Glider, and its load-bearing capacity is up to 250 lbs.
Previous page Next page 1 Nursery Room 2 Sitting Room 3 Bedroom 4 Living Room

Product Details High Backrest This glider nursery chair can give you strong support for your whole body. The high backrest provides you with great comfort and safety. Comfortable Armrest This ergonomically designed armrest allows you to comfortably position your arms while reading or nursery. Spacious Seat The deep seat of the glider chair is nearly 21 inches providing an extremely comfortable seating experience. Sturdy Footrest Unlike other Breastfeeding recliner chair, we offer a retractable footrest to create a more comfortable environment for you and your baby!

Is it a power rocker recliner? No, it's not electric, no need to plug it in to use it, purely manual nursery rocking chairs. What is the weight capacity of this swivel rocker recliner chair? Swivel recliner can hold up to 250 pounds. What is the seat depth of the recliner? The seat depth is roughly 21inch, catering to cross-legged sitting. How many degrees does the rocking chair rock back and forth and does it rock violently? Rocking chair rocks back and forth at about 20 degrees, smooth rocking. Was it easy to assemble? Yes, it only takes you 8-15 minutes to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair! Rocks beautifully and is super comfy! Recline is a little slow and arm rests are a little low. But other than that I love it and would recommend to anyone! Oh and I can't forget to mention assembly was a breeze. It took us 5 minutes to get it out of the box and connect the two pieces together.

reviews.reviewerName: Exactly what I was looking for! It fits perfectly and looks chic! Exactly what I was looking for! It fits perfectly and looks chic!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to put together!
reviews.reviewText: Put this together by myself at 30 weeks pregnant - super easy! It is a little bit more narrow than I thought, however, I still feel like I have room to move around in it as well as my husband. We are both 5’3 and 5’6. It does recline a little slow for me but I don’t mind that. It’s sturdy and I do not see this material getting dirty easily! I love the color. Overall, it’s definitely the best one in our budget. I highly recommend it! I can’t wait to rock our baby in it soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This chair is so comfortable and is my Best reading chair!!!
reviews.reviewText: I truly enjoy the comfort of the seating area, arm rest, head and back features. And as an added plus are the swivel and moving ability in any direction, whether N S E or West. Great chair, even better than the $600 one I purchased from Macy's in 2005. The manufacturer did a great job on this chair and the price is wonderful too. M McCoy, PA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described. Works great and it’s comfortable. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought a pair for my wife and me. I unboxed one to try, the seat is too high for my comfort , and my legswent numb in 40 min. it also will not lean back and still rock. my wife does not HATE it so i will keep one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatility at a Value Price
reviews.reviewText: These arrived earlier than stated much to my delight. They were easy to assemble. The swivel and glider features work very well. The seat is pretty firm but comfortable. The recliner aspect may loosen up after more use but at this time, it is a bit of a challenge to recline and keep it in a reclined position. Rightening it is an effort as well. For the price, I’m pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Comfortable Reclining Glider Rocker
reviews.reviewText: This small recliner isn't overly plush, but it's really comfortable. It's built well, and easy to assemble. I didn't see it mentioned in the description, but it is a glider style rocker, and it locks in place when you extent the foot rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This Rocking Chair Nursery Swivel Rocker Recliner comes in a very large box. I had the delivery person leave it near the front door where I broke down the box and brought in the two pieces separately. Most of the weight is in the base of the chair and it is very heavy for one person. Two people can make quick work of getting the base inside and placed where you want it. Connecting the top piece is just a matter of lining it up with the base and pushing hard till it clicks into place.I am five feet, four inches tall and when sitting all the way back in the chair my feet do not hit the ground. If I want to use the chair as a rocker I just place a pillow behind my back. When reclining my feet don’t fall over the edge of chair which makes it very comfortable to recline in. Closing the recliner takes a little more effort because you do need to back kick it back into locking position.I love the gray color and the fabric is nice, not at all scratchy. There is a bit of a new chair smell that quickly dissipates.
